title: How to make in-game cursor larger?
body:
So i changed from a 1080p resolution to a 1440p and my cursor is so small now. Is there any way i can make it larger again without going back to 1080p?

Thanks in advance, have a nice day! ^^

replies.body: Other than reducing the overall resolution, I don't believe there's any way of making the cursor bigger =\ .
Is there anyway a feature to make the cursor larger could be added later on? Like the HUD slider just add that for the cursor ^^
